sense.gloss: enlightenment, development, edification, public awareness, illumination, education, inspiration
Dear (so and so), Dear Sir, Dear Madam, To Whom It May Concern
"awakening of insects" solar term (approx. March 6, the day on which hibernating insects are said to come out of the ground)
Dear Sir or Madam, Dear Sirs, Gentlemen
the philosophy of the European Enlightenment
book for novices, general introduction to a subject
this will just be a short note, I'm writing to tell you
public awareness (e.g. publicity and education campaigns aimed at improving the health, environment, etc.)

r_ele.r: けいもうせんせいくんしゅ
けいもうぜったいくんしゅ

sense.gloss: return to the palace (usu. of the empress, crown prince, etc.)
salutation at the end of a formal letter

sdata.j: ↑絵本↑↓えほん↓は↑子供↑↓こども↓たちの↑頭↑↓あたま↓を↑啓発↑↓けいはつ↓する。
sdata.e: Picture books will cultivate the minds of children.

sdata.j: というわけで、↑人材↑↓じんざい↓を↑啓発↑↓けいはつ↓するためのセンターが↑日本↑↓にっぽん↓に↑作↑↓つく↓られるべきであろう。
sdata.e: Therefore, a center for the development of human resources should be built in Japan.

sdata.j: ずば↑抜↑↓ぬ↓けた↑着想↑↓ちゃくそう↓というのは、↑往々↑↓おうおう↓にして↑天啓↑↓てんけい↓のごとくヒラメクようだ。
sdata.e: Sometimes the most inspired ideas seem to just come from out of the blue.

sdata.j: ↑啓子↑↓けいこ↓さんは↑家族↑↓かぞく↓がご↑自慢↑↓じまん↓です。
sdata.e: Keiko is proud of her family.

sdata.j: ↑啓介↑↓けいすけ↓さんは、このお↑屋敷↑↓やしき↓で、ずっとお↑勉強↑↓べんきょう↓しているんです。いわゆるホームスクーリングという↑形↑↓かたち↓ですね。
sdata.e: Keisuke has always studied in this mansion. That style known as 'home schooling', right?

sdata.j: ↑啓子↑↓けいこ↓さんの↑問題↑↓もんだい↓はうわさで↑聞↑↓き↓き↑知↑↓し↓った。
sdata.e: I learned about Keiko's problem from gossip.

sdata.j: 「いらっしゃ～い」「よぉ」「なんだ、↑啓↑↓けい↓↑太↑↓ふと↓か・・・」
